column4: how do i find he correct govener and drivers for my p4...for cpu overclocking??
there isn't such as thing as "cpu" drivers, overclocking is a hardware thing
not beyond it's bounds. as I've said, overclocking is a hardware change, not software
that makes no differece
software like cpufreq and powernow d have options to change the cpu freq.. i just need the governer setup
they are not used for overclocking
ok, so we need to step back here. This channel is for ubuntu support issues, overclocking your hardware is nothing to do with ubuntu, so try a better channel dedicated to hardware/overlocking
yes, and we've told you the tools you want to use are not for overclocking,
this will be the last time it's explained. The tools you want to use in ubuntu are not for overclocking.
yes, but the software you want to use is NOT for overclocking
it's normally do through the bios or specific software, which is not within ubuntu
there is no such thing
you're welcome to ubuntu support here, but stop asking for overclocking support, the tools you want to use are not in ubuntu
because (as you've been told) the tools you want are not in ubuntu
correcct
what software documentation ?
please show me the documentation that says it's for overclocking your hardware
show me the documentation that tells me the tools are used for overclocking
no more discussion, show me the documentation that shows me the tools you want to use are for overclocking your cpu
overclocking a video card is different, show me the documentation that says "these tools are used for overclocking"
show me the documentation that says these tools are for overclockng - or stop discussing it
and you've been told, more than once it's not for overclocking, so stop asking
that is your only warning - drop it
